product_desc: Special Technique/Craft:Traditionally Kalamkari is a style of hand painting done on fabric with a pen, using natural dyes. The word Kalamkari is derived from a Persian word where 'kalam' means pen and 'kari' refers to craftsmanship.Now-a-days Kalamkari is a type of hand-painted or block-printed textile, wherein motifs are essentially printed with hand-carved traditional blocks with painted by hands using a pen. Motifs drawn in Kalamkari spans from flowers, peacock, paisleys to divine characters of Hindu epics like Mahabharata and Ramayana.Design:Region: Andhra Pradesh and Madhya PradeshBeige and MustardKalamkari printed nehru jacketMandarin collarFull button placketSleevelessThree pocketsAttached lining Craft: KalamkariDisclaimer:This is a handcrafted kurta is prone to colour bleeding due to the use of natural dyes The print on the garment might be uneven owing to the handcrafted nature of the product, adding essence to the garment.Taavi uses sustainable thread for the manufacturing of its garments.
pd_material: Size worn by the model: MChest: 38"Height: 5'11"
pdp_name: Men Beige And Mustard Kalamkari Block Print Pure Cotton Nehru Jacket

product_desc: Special Technique/Craft: Rustic Daboo or Dabu is an ancient mud resist hand-block print from Akola Rajasthan, Traditionally only natural dyes were used but now-a-days with the availability of synthetic dyes, a lot of colour variations are being tried by artisans. For a colourful look, fabrics can be dyed more than once, via the process of double or triple dabu. he process of dabu creates a subtle tonal depth in the prints where the patterns used are inspired by the motifs that are picked from nature & its surrounding elements.Design:Region: RajasthanMaroon & black floral printMandarin collarFull button placketSleevelessThree pocketsHas a lining Disclaimer:This is a handcrafted nehru jacket, and is prone to colour bleeding due to use of natural dyesThe print on the garment might be uneven owning to the handcrafted nature of the product, adding essence to the garment.Taavi uses sustainable thread for the manufacturing of its garments.
pd_material: Regular FitSize worn by the model: MChest: 36"Height: 6'
pdp_name: Mandarin Collar Floral Printed Rustic Dabu Nehru Jacket
